titleStmt.title: A view of the face unmasked, or, An answer to a scandalous pamphlet published by divers ministers and entituled The common prayer book unmasked wherein the lawfulness of using that book is maintained ... : whereunto are added also some arguments for the retaining of that book in our Church ... / by Sam. Wotton ...
titleStmt.author: Wotton, Sam. (Samuel)

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
